#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int T,N,A[100000],fenwick_tree[1000001];
int MaxVal = 1000000;
long long timeToSort;
			
int fenwick_read(int idx){
	int sum = 0;
	while (idx > 0){
		sum += fenwick_tree[idx];
		idx -= (idx & -idx);
	}
	return sum;
}

void fenwick_update(int idx ,int val){
	while (idx <= MaxVal){
		fenwick_tree[idx] += val;
		idx += (idx & -idx);
	}
}

int main(){
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--){
		scanf("%d",&N);
		for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i){
			scanf("%d",&A[i]);
		}
		memset(fenwick_tree,0,sizeof(fenwick_tree));
		timeToSort = 0;
		for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i){
			timeToSort += (i - fenwick_read(A[i]));
			//if(fenwick_read(A[i])) timeToSort++;
			fenwick_update(A[i],1);
		}
		printf("%lld\n", timeToSort);
	}
}
